articles.author: Andrew McGowan
articles.title: ‘Toy Story 5’ Trailer: Woody and Buzz Are Terrified of High-Tech Tablet in Pixar’s Sequel - Variety
articles.description: Disney releases first trailer for Pixar's 'Toy Story 5,' where Woody and Buzz are scared of a smart tablet.
articles.content:
Woody, Buzz and the “Toy Story” gang are back in the first teaser trailer for “Toy Story 5,” the fifth film in Pixar‘s iconic series, set to release on June 19, 2026.
In the trailer, the toys meet L… [+1862 chars]
